pages.text: Smoked Herb Blends are basically just normal Herb Blends, but the effect potency and duration are buffed.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides blindness to the targeted player)Smoked Shaded Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Sets the target on fire)Smoked Incinerating Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides haste to the targeted player)Smoked Dashing Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides mining fatigue to the targeted player)Smoked Hindering Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides night vision to the targeted player)Smoked Observing Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides poison to the targeted player)Smoked Virulent Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides regeneration to the targeted player)Smoked Regenerative Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides regeneration and slowness to the targeted player)Smoked Conflicting Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides regeneration, speed, and weakness to the targeted player)Smoked Alternative Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides slowness to the targeted player)Smoked Sedating Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides speed to the targeted player)Smoked Acceleration Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides weakness to the targeted player)Smoked Diminished Blend$() is shown above.
The conjuration to create a $(t:Provides wither to the targeted player)Smoked Decaying Blend$() is shown above.
These entries may also be useful in your studies.
